mapper.select: SELECT c.com_name, c.com_no, r.title, r.qualification, r.career, r.deadline_date, r.location, r.pay FROM recruit r JOIN company c ON c.com_no = r.com_no WHERE c.com_no = #{com_no} ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC
SELECT r.*, cd.*, c.* FROM recruit r JOIN company_detail cd ON r.com_no = cd.com_no JOIN company c ON r.com_no = c.com_no ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC

SELECT r.*, c.*, cd.* FROM recruit r JOIN company_detail cd ON r.com_no = cd.com_no JOIN company c ON r.com_no = c.com_no WHERE c.com_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR c.com_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR r.location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR r.career LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR cd.sectors LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
